name: Roy Tang
text: I make no claims as to the bases (since we are liable to disagree on what constitutes an acceptable basis anyway and I seriously don't know kung merong legitimate basis yung paranoia). Re: paranoia, AFAIK the AFP has asserted no awareness of any "destabilizatio n plot", IDK what their basis for that is either though. It's also weird to be so insecure for an administration that claims to have the support of the majority of the people, both houses of congress, the AFP and the PNP.
